message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm on a budget, and that's as high as I can go.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I could come down to $11,000, which is a fair compromise.
I'm still interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
